participant_1.name: Alexandra
participant_1.personality: Confident and determined, always striving for excellence in everything she does.
participant_1.background: My favorite color is yellow. I love Italian food and garlic bread. I am a gold medalist Olympian. Gymnastics is my favorite sport. I workout four hours a day.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and dedicated, always looking to help others while balancing work and family.
participant_2.background: My favorite movie is Friday. I'm now looking for a new job. I'm a doctor. My daughter is a child prodigy. I enjoy going to the park.
